overview: Vincent Fabrizzi serves as the Chief Sales and Marketing Officer at Jagged Peak and the primary media contact of the company. Prior to joining Jagged Peak, Fabrizzi was CEO and Co-Founder of Compass Marketing Services, a logistics and fulfillment services company. Previously, Fabrizzi co-founded Paradigm Communications in 1989 with Jagged Peakâ€™s COO, Dan Furlong. Together over the next eight years they built the company into one of the Southeastâ€™s largest nationally recognized advertising agencies with over 160 employees, $60 million in revenues and an impressive list of Fortune 500 clients. Vince has served on the Board since the launch of Jagged Peak in 2000. He holds a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering from West Virginia University.
